    OUR FLEET

WELCOME TO YOUR NEXT BIG ADVENTURE

Don’t think twice before trading hotels for a wonderful adventure of discovering and enjoy new places with your own pace and freedom. Enjoy the complete freedom of exploring our beautiful country! Live in incredible places! Stay as long as you like! Find new unbeaten spots! Make everyday one of a kind!

Travel off the beaten track

Find Portugal and Spain wild spots, sleep on top of unknown beaches, visit the picturesque old towns and castles, all with the full comfort of your new house on wheels. Just get out of the airport and we’ll be there waiting for you, with your new house ready. A few minutes after your arrival, you will be able to unpack your bags, have a drink, let the children play. We will take you to a nice spot, explain everything and let you start your dream holidays.

INSPIRATIONAL ITINERARIES

Explore a wide selection of itineraries within Portugal and Spain. We can design you an amazing motorhome experiences to make your dream holidays come true!

More info

A KIDS DREAM

Play a board game, see a movie, paint a color book, read a book… kids can do all of this while traveling to your next destination. Give them an unforgettable experience, that they will love and help them grow.

DEFINITION OF COMFORT

Blankets, duvets cushions, bed linen & towels, cooking equipment, tableware & cutlery, beach towels & sun shield, outdoor table & chairs for free for every guest.

TOP EXPERIENCES

With CaravanConcierge you can get discounts with our partners on incredible experiences that will enrich the motorhome trip: hot air balloon flight, horse riding on the white sands of the portuguese beaches or the plains, boat trips to visit the dolphins, a safari experience, wine tasting, adventure parks and much more ...

More Info

LIVE THE NATURE

Wake up with the sound of flowing water. Take the kayak and explore the wilderness. Stop by an old town. Take the bikes and explore the streets and its people. Admire the sunset at the beach. Take the surfboard and challenge yourself.

Packages
This was one of our best holidays to date. Not only because this camper van was in great shape and fully equipped (towels, beach towels, bed linen, camping equipment, a fully stocked kitchen with everything you need etc), but what made this trip so special was the host.
Dörte
Bern, Switzerland

What make us different?

Choose from some of the most popular vacation packages

You can rely on us!

We are available 24/7 to personally assisting you, for clarifying any doubt, giving suggestions on route (alternative placesand experiences 🙂)

Arrive and unpack

We can welcome you at airport or at main central train stations from the city where the motorhome is based with small extra cost. any time in any day!

Adventure Awaits

Wide range of thematic routes: Portugal Top to Bottom, Portugal Along the Coast, Gastronomy and Heritage, travelling with Kids, and much more...

ABOUT US

We are nomads in our hearts.

We truly love our country, our food, our heritage, our beaches, the ocean, the mountain, cycling, surfing…

And, most importantly, we want to share all these wonders with you!
